```
version: '3.9'

services:

  db:

    image: mariadb:10.9

    environment:

      MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD: `this-is-your-root-password`

      MARIADB_ROOT_HOST: "%"

    ports:

      - 3306:3306

    volumes:

      - ./db_data:/var/lib/mysql

 adminer:

    image: adminer

    ports:

      - 8080:8080
```

```
**docker-compose up**
```

```
SELECT *

FROM books

WHERE

    author_id=2 AND

    (

        title LIKE '%red%' OR

        title LIKE '%green%' OR

        title LIKE '%blue%'

    );
```

```
SELECT

    books.title,

    authors.name

FROM books

JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id;
```

```
SELECT

    books.title,

    authors.name

FROM authors

LEFT JOIN books ON books.author_id = authors.id;
```

```
SELECT books.title

FROM books

LEFT JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id

WHERE authors.name = 'Carl Sagan';
```

```
UPDATE books

SET title='Hacks, Leaks, and Revelations: The Art of Analyzing Hacked and Leaked Data'

WHERE id=1;
```

```
SELECT id, name, cr_date, exp_date

FROM domain

ORDER BY cr_date DESC

LIMIT 10;
```

```
SELECT id, name, cr_date, exp_date

FROM domain

WHERE name LIKE '%trump%'

ORDER BY cr_date DESC;
```

```
SELECT id, domain, cr_date, plan, server_id

FROM hosting

ORDER BY cr_date DESC

LIMIT 5;
```

```
SELECT id, api_host, login_host, login_port, username, password

FROM hosting_server;
```

```
SELECT COUNT(*)

FROM hosting

LEFT JOIN hosting_server ON hosting_server.id=hosting.server_id

WHERE hosting.server_id=23;
```

```
SELECT

    server_id,

    COUNT(*) AS server_count

FROM hosting

LEFT JOIN hosting_server ON hosting_server.id=hosting.server_id

GROUP BY hosting.server_id;
```
